headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Earn Triple Payouts on Classic Sumo Modes
content: There are many ways to play Sumo: use weight and strength to ram foes head-on; outmaneuver the opposition with speed and handling; or give it the old rope-a-dope. Whatever works for you, maintain control of the zone and youâ€™ll be handsomely rewarded with Triple GTA$ and RP for revisiting this classic mode in both Sumo and Sumo (Remix) - now through April 21st.
